de.lessvoid.nifty

Class NiftyNodeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.NiftyNodeBuilder

  • public class NiftyNodeBuilder
extends Object
    A fluent API to help building the NiftyNode structure. Created by void on 09.08.15.
